en_text: Resonance?
jp_text: 共振？

en_text: Stop it, Dana!
jp_text: やめなさい　ダーナ

en_text: Go!
jp_text: 行け

en_text: I am here, because you\nwere there for me.
jp_text: 君がいるから俺は今ここにいる
google_translated: I'm here now because you are

en_text: That's the sound of an\nattacker's sonar!
jp_text: 攻撃ソナーの音だ
google_translated: It is the sound of the attacking sonar

en_text: May I use your phone?
jp_text: 電話を貸してくれ

en_text: Are you going to hire a good lawyer?
jp_text: 腕利きの弁護士でも雇うつもりか
google_translated: Are you going to hire a bearer

en_text: We're the only ones who can do that.
jp_text: 今それができるのは我々だけだ
google_translated: It is only us who can do it now

en_text: It's like a whale that has\nforgotten how to swim.
jp_text: まるで泳ぎを忘れたクジラだな
google_translated: It's a whale who forgot to swim

en_text: It has increased speed to 30 knots.\NDistance is two miles.
jp_text: マジですね

en_text: They're ready to be launched\nat any time.
jp_text: いつでも発射できます

en_text: Well...
jp_text: あの…

en_text: Remember Pearl Harbor!\NLaunch number three!
jp_text: リメンバー　パールハーバー

en_text: Launch number three!
jp_text: 3番と4番の発射管扉開きました
google_translated: The third and fourth launch tube door opened

en_text: High speed screw in the water,\ndirection 2-9-8.
jp_text: 方位　2-9-8の水中に高速スクリュー音
google_translated: High speed screw sound in water of 2-9-8

en_text: This is the worst case.
jp_text: 最悪だわ

en_text: Let me control the submarine now!
jp_text: 今すぐ操艦を私に任せなさい
google_translated: Leave the carport to me now

en_text: No!
jp_text: だめ

en_text: It's a matter of life and death\nfor this submarine!
jp_text: この艦が沈むかどうかの瀬戸際なのよ
google_translated: It's a setting of whether this ship sinks

en_text: I'm not sure if I can avoid it,
jp_text: やってみなきゃわからんだろ
google_translated: I do not know if I have to do it

en_text: so it's definitely impossible for you to.
jp_text: 自殺する気？
google_translated: Do you want to commit suicide?

en_text: You'll die too. Are you going\nto kill yourself?
jp_text: あなたも死にますよ

en_text: Kill myself?
jp_text: 自殺か

en_text: This is the most luxurious way\nto commit suicide in the world.
jp_text: 世界一豪勢な自殺だな
google_translated: It is a world's best suicide

en_text: I kind of like that idea.
jp_text: 俺はそういうの嫌いじゃないぜ
google_translated: I do not dislike that kind

en_text: and the missile attack\non the Bunker Hill...
jp_text: バンカーヒルへのミサイル攻撃も

en_text: We've been misjudging this man\nfrom the beginning.
jp_text: 私たちは初めからこの男を見誤っていた
google_translated: We were mistaken for this guy from the beginning

en_text: Why?
jp_text: ど…どうして

en_text: Shall we go for a game of chicken?\NDive to a depth of 1500.
jp_text: 深度1500まで潜航

en_text: I don't care. Let's try it.
jp_text: かまわんよ　試してみようぜ

en_text: If we stay like this, we may become\nfood for the sharks.
jp_text: このままだと俺たち　まとめてサメの餌になっちまうぜ
google_translated: If this is left, we will be bait for sharks together

en_text: Don't worry. I heard this sub could\ngo faster than torpedoes.
jp_text: 聞いた話じゃ　この艦は魚雷より速く走れるんだろ
google_translated: You can run this ship faster than torpedo

en_text: And they're US military.
jp_text: しかも相手は米軍だぞ
google_translated: And the other party is the US military

en_text: So what?! Stop bluffing.
jp_text: だから何だってんだい

en_text: Come out with your hands up, Kurz.\NI may be able to save your life.
jp_text: 両手を上げて出てこいよ　クルツ
google_translated: Raise both hands and come out

en_text: I'm serious. Let's go to the\NCommand Center together.
jp_text: 一緒に発令所まで行こうぜ
google_translated: Let's go to the official place together

en_text: and kill one of the crew\nbefore his eyes.
jp_text: ガウルンに話して　クルーの一人でも殺してみせるんだよ
google_translated: Talk to Gaurun and let me kill even one of the crews

en_text: Then you can join our team.\NYou'll get paid well.
jp_text: 助けてやってもいいぜ

en_text: Oh, that's so uncool!\NIt's too embarrassing.
jp_text: ダッセ　恥ずかしすぎる

en_text: Mithril is a mercenary unit,\nnot a friend of justice.
jp_text: ミスリルは傭兵部隊だ　正義の味方じゃあない
google_translated: Misril is a mercenary unit, justice of justice

en_text: I think I've told you before,
jp_text: 前にも言ったが

en_text: Isn't it our rule to work for the\ncustomer who pays more?
jp_text: 俺たちの常識じゃなかったのか

en_text: Come out!
jp_text: 出てきな

en_text: I made up my mind, Guen.
jp_text: 決めたよ　グェン

en_text: I'll kill you and ask Tessa for a bonus.
jp_text: かっこつけて義理立てしても　得しねぇぜ

en_text: I'll take a sexy shot of her\nin her swimsuit
jp_text: 水着姿のセクシーショットを撮らせてもらって
google_translated: Get a sexy shot in swimsuit

en_text: If a hundred guys buy them, I'll make\ntwo thousand. That's it.
jp_text: 100人が買えば2000ドル

en_text: I thought you were smarter than that.
jp_text: お前はもう少し利口だと思っていたんだがな
google_translated: You thought that you were a little more

en_text: It doesn't matter how smart I am.\NI'm just practical.
jp_text: 俺はただ現実的なだけだよ

en_text: Here it is.
jp_text: 利口かどうかじゃねぇ
google_translated: Whether it is an open mouth

en_text: TAROS?
jp_text: TAROS？

en_text: This seems like an older model\nthan one on the Arbalest.
jp_text: これはアーバレストのTAROSより旧式みたいね
google_translated: This seems to be older than Arbalast's Taros

en_text: Instead of being connected\nto a Lambda Driver,
jp_text: 接続されているのはラムダ・ドライバじゃなくて

en_text: it's connected to the submarine's\ncontrol system.
jp_text: この艦の制御系だわ

en_text: What?
jp_text: なに

en_text: I kind of understand. I see.
jp_text: 何となくわかった

en_text: Chidori!
jp_text: 千鳥

en_text: Thank you, Sagara-san.\NYou're done here.
jp_text: ありがとう　相良さん

en_text: Would you come to rescue me next?
jp_text: 今度は私を助けに来てくれますか
google_translated: Will you come to help me this time

en_text: For me, such money is the same\nas toilet paper.
jp_text: 俺に言わせりゃ　そんな金は紙くず同然だよ
google_translated: If I tell me, such money is not good paper

en_text: It's not good enough\nto wipe your butt.
jp_text: ケツ拭く紙にもなりゃしねぇ
google_translated: It is also possible to wipe the ass

en_text: You jumped over him and jumped away\nfrom him. You looked like a chimp.
jp_text: 飛びついたり離れたり

en_text: Who was he? Guen? Kurz,\nwhy was he trying... What?
jp_text: そいつ　誰？

en_text: What have you been doing, big sister?
jp_text: 姉さん　何してたんだよ

en_text: I didn't want to go to the hangar\ndressed like this, so I was hiding.
jp_text: この格好で格納庫行くの嫌だったから

en_text: Then I came here and I saw\nyou guys fighting.
jp_text: そしたらこっちでドンパチが始まって
google_translated: Then the don Pachi begins here

en_text: Hey, hey!
jp_text: おいおい

en_text: I don't understand the situation.\NWhat happened to Venom?
jp_text: 状況がわかんないわ
google_translated: I do not know the situation

en_text: Warning! There is a fire on\nthird deck, corridor B.
jp_text: 警告　第3甲板　B通路で火災発生

en_text: Warning! H7 pressure baffle on\nfirst deck has abnormal noise.
jp_text: 警告　第1甲板　H7の圧力隔壁に異常音
google_translated: Warning Anomalous noise on the pressure bulkhead of the first deck H7

en_text: All right, it's good.\NIt's coming, it's coming!
jp_text: きたきたきた

en_text: We're going to avoid it. Can we\ndo that? No, maybe not.
jp_text: いや　できねぇかな

en_text: Dana...
jp_text: そう　まだ…

en_text: Launch counter measures one and\ntwo when I give you the signal.
jp_text: 私の合図で1番　2番のカウンターメジャーを射出しなさい
google_translated: Eject the No. 2 Counter Major with my Seiki

en_text: Set them to deep-water mode.
jp_text: 深海モードよ

en_text: Now!
jp_text: 今

en_text: Aye, emergency blow!
jp_text: アイ　エマージェンシーブロー

en_text: Yes, they appear to have done\nan emergency blow.
jp_text: はい　緊急ブローを使ったようです
google_translated: Yes seems to have used urgent blow

en_text: How could it do that in such\na short distance?
jp_text: まさか　あの距離でか
google_translated: Is it still at that distance

en_text: He certainly is unbelievable.\NWhat a daredevil he is!
jp_text: くそっ　なんて野郎だ

en_text: What kind of magic did you use?
jp_text: どんな魔法を使った？

en_text: Don't you understand? It means\NDana didn't trust you that much.
jp_text: わかりませんか

en_text: Now the ship is mine. I won't let\nyou do whatever you feel like.
jp_text: もうこの艦は私のものです
google_translated: The ship is already my one

en_text: And!
jp_text: そして…

en_text: Kashim!
jp_text: カシム

en_text: Do you think I will?\NThink about it, honey.
jp_text: すると思うか

en_text: Sergeant Sagara! Shoot him!
jp_text: 相良軍曹　撃ちなさい

en_text: Damn it!
jp_text: くそっ

en_text: Another torpedo is coming. We need\nto be able to control the submarine!
jp_text: 大至急で艦を制御しなきゃならん
google_translated: I have to control the ship as soon as possible

en_text: One ADCAP is from direction 2-7-8.\NDistance is 50. We're stuck!
jp_text: 方位2-7-8にADCAPが1本

en_text: Sousuke...
jp_text: 了…了解

en_text: Tessa told me.
jp_text: テッサが教えてくれた

en_text: Sergeant!
jp_text: ぐ…軍曹

en_text: I see! It's the safety system\nfor torpedoes!
jp_text: 魚雷の安全装置だ

en_text: The US Navy's surface ship is nearby,
jp_text: 近くに米軍の水上艦がいる　だから向こうの潜水艦は
google_translated: Because there is a watercraft of the US military nearby

en_text: to avoid friendly fire.
jp_text: 友軍への誤射を避けるために
google_translated: To avoid falsehood to a friend

en_text: What a woman! Oh, my goodness!
jp_text: なんて人だ　まったく

en_text: Gauron, where are you?
jp_text: ガウルン　どこだ

en_text: Gauron...
jp_text: 緊急…ブローを…

en_text: Damn it! We missed again!
jp_text: くっそぉ　また外れたか

en_text: It appears that they know\nabout our safety system.
jp_text: 最初からこちらの安全装置を読んでいたようですね
google_translated: It seems that I was reading this safety device from the beginning

en_text: Or it could just be a coincidence.
jp_text: もしくは偶然か

en_text: Shut up!
jp_text: 黙れ

en_text: Disable the torpedo's safety system\nand try one more time!
jp_text: 魚雷の安全装置を外して　もう一回シュートだ
google_translated: Remove the safety device of the torpedo and run it one more time

en_text: He's trapped like a rat.
jp_text: なのにそれすらあいつは楽しんでいる

en_text: He's so happy and excited from\nthe bottom of his heart.
jp_text: うれしくて心底わくわくしている

en_text: All he's thinking of is hitting\nthe ball out of the park!
jp_text: {\fsp0}あいつが考えているのはボールを場外にかっ飛ばすことだけよ

jp_text: ヴェノム

jp_text: あいつは　スタジアムに向かっている
google_translated: He is heading to the stadium

en_text: Injured person here!\NSend a stretcher!
jp_text: 負傷者だ

en_text: Take care of the wound later. You\nneed to keep the airway open.
jp_text: 傷の手当ては後でいい　気道を確保するよ
google_translated: Sense of wounds will secure a good airway later

en_text: Yes!
jp_text: はい

en_text: Doctor! Dr. Goldberry!
jp_text: 先生　ゴールドベリ先生

en_text: It's extremely important\nto anchor the cargo.
jp_text: 今後も規則を徹底させよう
google_translated: Let's thoroughly rule the rules in the future

jp_text: あのテロリストです

jp_text: 逃げました　まだどこかに潜んでいます

en_text: But thanks to the Captain,\NDana has recovered.
jp_text: ですが艦長のおかげでダーナは回復しました
google_translated: But thanks to the captain, Danna has recovered

en_text: What happened to the terrorist?
jp_text: テロリストはどうなった？

jp_text: ゴダート　そのテロリストは負傷しているか

jp_text: はい　相良軍曹に撃たれて

en_text: In his left shoulder?
jp_text: 左肩か

en_text: This isn't good!
jp_text: 誰でもいい　やつを止めろ

en_text: Damn!
jp_text: しまった

jp_text: 負傷者を連れて格納庫から退避

en_text: Go anywhere! Hurry up and run!
jp_text: どこでもいい　早く逃げろ

en_text: I can do it. I can still do it!
jp_text: いけるぜ　まだまだいける

jp_text: あんた　かなめと一緒にあたしたちまで守るつもり？

jp_text: 目が覚めたか

en_text: Had enough!
jp_text: たくさんだ

en_text: I'm so happy, Kashim!
jp_text: うれしいぜ　カシム

jp_text: ガウルン　貴様は…

jp_text: 次回「フルメタル・パニック」最終回

jp_text: イントゥ・ザ・ブルー
